goals.active: Disrupt the Mouth of Zhaitan's supply line.
goals.complete: I led a Pact squad on a mission to destroy the ship and the couriers that bring magical objects to the Mouth of Zhaitan. Our intent was to cut off Zhaitan's food supply by starving its Mouth, but the Mouth itself emerged and we were forced to kill it directly. I returned to Fort Trinity to meet with Trahearne and plan the Pact's next move.

goals.active: Report to Trahearne to plan the Pact's next move.
goals.complete: I met with Marshal Trahearne and decided the Pact's next step was to cut off the supply of dead bodies that Zhaitan corrupts into soldiers for its army.
